p: The enantiomeric distribution and enantiomeric excess ( e.e.) ( Table 2) of some chiral metabolites were determined on a cyclodextrine-based chiral stationary phase (MEGA-DEX-DET), comparing the retention time of separated enantiomers with enantiomerically pure standards. Two couples of chiral monoterpenoids were detected. The enantiomeric excesses of (+)-Î²-pinene and (+)-sabinene were quite considerable. These results further confirm that plants can also contain both enantiomers in the essential oil ( Figure 3).
